modName: Companion Girls - 4 New Companion To Skyrim - Remake In Progress
summary: This Mod Adds 4 New Companions To Skyrim. They Are All Female and If This Makes Success I Will Make a Male Version. Read More Inside.
descriptionHtml:
REMADE IS DONE.  LINK = http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22405
REMADE Info - Much Better. 

=================================================================
Important -> This Mod Is Kidda Bugged With A Discolouration Bug.
but If U Want To Try It Out Sure Why not. But I am Just Saying Its Kidda
Bugged. I Will Not Have Such Bugs In Future Mods Becasue i Found A Fix 
For It. I Will Not Update This Mod. I Am Still Learning How to Mod
So Step By Step. Thank You :) - I Am Making A Remake So Prepare For Another one :)
================================================================
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Desc. And Info About This Mod

- Adds A 4 New Companions To Skyrim. 

-> Diane
-> Alessandra
-> Marzia
-> Felicie

*One Of Them Is Archer. (Marzia)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Small Personal Question.  (Please Answer Me In Comments Or Pm)

- How can I Make Them CBBEv3 Compatible So that The Skins Wont Change
From The Face to The Body?  - thx
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Very Useful Mod When Going Some were Dangerous.
- Located At - The Sleeping Giant Inn At Riverwood.

Mod Requirements

- ApachiiSkyHair NPC Overhaul 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Info About Future Mods

- I will Be making Companion Mods, So If U Like These Things Make Sure U Add Me :)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

info about Other/Permissions

- I Allow Mod Reviews. Just Comment In The Comments The Link :) (Or Pm Me)
- I Do Not Give Permission To Copy This Mod. yet I Do Allow translations.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
